thread.section_title: OFX Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OFX | ofx.com
thread.title: Bronia Hamilton

author: Bronia Hamilton
title: Bronia Hamilton
text: I had not sent money internationally for a number of years but I had had a positive experience with Ozforex (as it was then known) and so I organised to use them again. What I didn't realise is that my bank account details had changes since last time! The money went out of my account in Aus but didn't come into my account in Norway. I went in to double check and realised my error! I was seriously panicking at the prospect of having sent the equivalent of half a year's salary into the ether! Ofx were available and sorted this out very quickly. The money was only delayed a couple of days despite my colossal mistake. Professional yet understanding. Thanks!
